Title: From Realtor to AI Developer, with Brandon Gallmeyer, on Mr. Maeda's Cozy AI Kitchen
Description:
Welcome to another inspiring episode of the Cozy AI Kitchen! 🧑‍🍳💻 In this episode, we meet Chef Gallmeyer, a 19-year-old realtor from Whidbey Island who’s transforming the real estate game by building his own AI-powered CRM app — without a traditional software background. Hosted by John Maeda, this conversation dives into how Chef Gallmeyer leveraged tools like ChatGPT, OpenAI APIs, PostgreSQL, and GitHub to create a custom app tailored for real estate professionals. From Scratch programming in elementary school to building a full-featured CRM with property search, comparative market analysis, and social media post generation — this is a masterclass in self-driven innovation. Whether you're a realtor, accountant, or just curious about how AI can empower non-developers, this episode will show you what’s possible when creativity meets technology.

⏱️ Chapters 00:01 – You Think You Can’t Code? Think Again! 00:07 – Meet Chef Gallmeyer: Realtor Turned Developer 00:30 – Why AI Tools Changed the Game for Real Estate 01:28 – Building a Custom CRM with AI Features 02:43 – From Scratch to PostgreSQL: Learning to Code 04:00 – Smart Pipelines and Google Calendar Integration 05:02 – Property Search Powered by AI 06:04 – Using OpenAI for Real-Time Client Support 07:00 – Social Media Post Generator Demo 08:01 – Designing for Accessibility: Light Mode Challenge 08:56 – Final Thoughts: Empowering Non-Developers with AI 📚 What You’ll Learn

- How a realtor built a CRM app using ChatGPT and OpenAI APIs
- Why AI tools can give professionals a competitive edge
- Best practices for customizing CRM tools for buyers vs. sellers
- How to generate social media posts automatically with AI
- The importance of accessibility in app design (light/dark mode)
🎙️ Speakers Chef Gallmeyer – Realtor & Self-Taught Developer https://brandongallmeyer.com/
